# USB Accessory Audio Source Dictionary Keys

**API Collection**

Keys for the dictionaries in the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionProperty_InputSources] array.

## Constants

- **kAudioSession_InputSourceKey_ID**: An audio input source.
- **kAudioSession_InputSourceKey_Description**: Audio input source description.

## USB Accessories

- **USB Accessory Audio Destination Dictionary Keys**: Keys for the dictionaries in the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionProperty_OutputDestinations] array.
